programme.desc: Bologna and Fiorentina go toe-to-toe in Serie A at Stadio Renato Dall'Ara. Bologna will be looking to beat Fiorentina in Serie A for the first time since February 2013.(n)

programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Sampdoria host Lazio at Stadio Luigi Ferraris. Lazio will be hoping to end a run of six away league games without a win.(n)

programme.desc: Juventus host Genoa at Allianz Stadium. Should they win, Max Allegri will celebrate his 150th win in Serie A with Juventus, and his 250th in the competition overall.(n)
